creator: slide+slide@ambre.net
text:
The actual lucene version is 2.0.0.

 You can find at http://www.ambre.net/misc/lucene-1.4-to-2 a patch to upgrade
slide to use this version

Thanks very much for this very helpful patch. I was looking for a solution to make jakarta-slide build in 
gump (meaning against the head revisions of its dependencies) and lucene APIs had changed a bit since 
slide was last updated. Best regards. Antoine
creator: antoine@apache.org
